perturbation.original_text: A. This Agreement and the provisions hereof, except as otherwise provided, shall be in full force and effect commencing on the date of execution by both Parties and shall extend for an initial term of two (2) years. This Agreement shall be automatically renewed for additional extended terms each of two (2) years duration unless either party notifies the other in writing of its intention not to renew the Agreement, such notification to be provided at least ninety (90) days prior to the expiration of the then in-effect term. The initial two (2) year term as it might be extended herein is referred to herein as the "Term."
perturbation.changed_text: A. This Agreement and the provisions hereof, except as otherwise provided, shall be in full force and effect commencing on the date of execution by both Parties and shall extend for an initial term of two (2) years. This Agreement may be renewed at the discretion of the COMPANY for additional extended terms each of two (2) years duration unless either party notifies the other in writing of its intention not to renew the Agreement, such notification to be provided at least ninety (90) days prior to the expiration of the then in-effect term. The initial two (2) year term as it might be extended herein is referred to herein as the "Term."
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the agreement is automatically renewed, while the modified version states it may be renewed at the discretion of the company. This creates uncertainty regarding the terms of renewal and favors the COMPANY. This could lead to disputes over whether the CONTENT PROVIDER can assume renewal or if the COMPANY has the right to deny it.

perturbation.original_text: A. Subject to the terms and conditions of the applicable content agreement with such Licensor, CONTENT PROVIDER will have sole control and responsibility over the data and information contained in the Content.
perturbation.changed_text: A. Subject to the terms and conditions of the applicable content agreement with such Licensor, COMPANY will have control and responsibility over the data and information contained in the Content, and CONTENT PROVIDER will be available to assist COMPANY with any and all data and information needs.
perturbation.explanation: The original text assigns sole control over content data to the CONTENT PROVIDER. The modification gives control to the COMPANY, while making the CONTENT PROVIDER only a source of assistance. The parties could argue over their control in determining the data and information that is provided.

perturbation.original_text: A. CONTENT PROVIDER will provide to COMPANY the Content, which will comply with thedescription attached hereto as Exhibit A.
perturbation.changed_text: A. CONTENT PROVIDER will use reasonable efforts to provide to COMPANY the Content, which will comply with the description attached hereto as Exhibit A.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states CONTENT PROVIDER'S responsibility in giving content to COMPANY. The modified text makes it subject to 'reasonable efforts'. This creates a contradiction with the original text because, initially, CONTENT PROVIDER was to give content, but now there is room to make an argument that they do not have to give the content if a 'reasonable effort' has been attempted.
